column4: Is there a non graphical login manager to speed up booting? (I still want to load the GUI)
the time spent loading the login screen is the time spent loading the GUI, so if you disable that, it'll take just as long to start up.
if you disable it from starting GDM (I forget how though) it'll just kick you to a commandline login. After you log in, you'll have to start the GUI manually with "startx" though.
and that's what'll take just as long as starting GDM.
